description: Frozen Pomegranate Margarita is best served when the weather outside is frightful. This cocktail will not only keep you cool but can also be made in advance for easy entertaining later on in the day. The best part about this drink? It's got a festive color!
name: Frozen Pomegranate Margarita

recipeInstructions.name: To make the salt rim, rub a lime wedge around the edge of your glass and dip it into kosher salt.
recipeInstructions.text: To make the salt rim, rub a lime wedge around the edge of your glass and dip it into kosher salt.

recipeInstructions.name: Fill the blender with ice, tequila, pomegranate juice, fresh lime juice, and agave syrup.
recipeInstructions.text: Fill the blender with ice, tequila, pomegranate juice, fresh lime juice, and agave syrup.

recipeInstructions.name: Blend until smooth for about 30 seconds or so. Pour in glasses over more ice if needed (optional). Garnish with pomegranate arils!
